channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [MAHOUT-1339] Add RAT check; fix copyright headers
item.description: Many files in the project don't carry the standard license header. There is a plugin called RAT that automates these checks. The attached patch adds a suitable RAT config, and fixes the errors it identifies. (I'm not yet proposing making the check part of the build.)
item.summary: Add RAT check; fix copyright headers

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
